entry.title: Saturday: Rain or drizzle. High 12.

entry.title: Saturday night: A few rain showers or flurries. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few rain showers beginning this evening then changing to a few flurries after midnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 60 late this evening. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023
